lines.name: Crow?
lines.line: (I am not even a crow, I should not cry like that)

lines.name: Eagle
lines.line: Oh you are already there. I was expecting you. How, you ask?

lines.name: Eagle
lines.line: It was very easy actually, even within this pyramid my sight is beyond your human reason.

lines.name: Eagle
lines.line: Of course, I am Ra! God among gods, creator of the universe and most beautiful bird in this pyramid.

lines.name: Steve
lines.line: And the only one for sure!

lines.name: Ra
lines.line: Are you trying to make a fool out of me, deity of the sun? Do not try your luck or you will be consumed by my infinite power!

lines.name: Steve
lines.line: Or I could make a delightful meal out of your bird flesh...

lines.name: Ra
lines.line: That is too much for me to handle. I will take you to a place where no one ever escaped from.

lines.name: Ra
lines.line: I will make you suffer. You will die here you filthy human.

lines.name: Ra
lines.line: You will never solve these puzzles! This tomb will be your tomb!
